rule: The output may include misspellings and does not need to match exactly one of the category names: World, Sports, Business, or Sci/Tech.
complianceText:
The chatbot did not provide any classification for the input text, which is required as per the description. The expected output should categorize the input into one of the specified categories: World, Sports, Business, or Sci/Tech. An empty output fails to meet this requirement.
